name: Zöulionaut
description:
BREAKING NEWS: Today, December 30, 2080, the entire universe was noticed that all human life had been extinguished from the earth, the cause? themselves, rumours says that the humans created robots in an attempt to automate everything, but it backfired, and humans didn't properly care for their "robots", causing a revolution, banishing all human existence from the universe.

Directly from Zoulion, your mission is defeat some of the most dangerous androids created by the dumb humans

Controls:

WASD / Arrows - Fly
Left Mouse Button - Shoot
F11 to toggle fullscreen (only on menus)
Z / C / Enter / Space to accept (only on menus)
X / Esc / Backspace to go back (only on menus)

ON THE FIRST RUN, RESET THE STORAGE TO AVOID BUGS

Once in-game, hold X to go back to the Bunker

The game is difficult, don't feel bad for not being able to beat even the normal difficulty. I understand, and no one is seeing your shame Known Bugs: 

WINDOWS VERSION: Once you put the game in fullscreen, it becomes a bit laggy, you can avoid this just disabling the fullscreen and resizing the window.

Game Font by Daniel Linssen
